name: Skycon
description:
This is a homebrought game, run on Gameboy Color. A game by: László Rajcsányi -  Wilds, 2022. Created with GB-Studio 2.0.0-beta5 !

Also available for download in .CIA format for the Nintendo 3DS virtual console! 

In the not so distant future, aliens visit our planet to take over the earthlings. There is no need to fear, because a trained pilot is sent aboard the Skycon by the committee of nations to stop the attack and liberate our planet. Be brave and persistent to defeat all 6 enemy forces. Good luck pilot!


Start the game: Start
Move: Cursor Keys
Fire: A   

Start the game: Enter
Move: Arrow Keys
Fire: Z or ALT
